text: if you really want to grow a seed crop like there's definitely ways to work around isolation issues um or looking at specific crops that have a fairly narrow isolation distance um but yeah we love working with Urban farmers and urban Gardeners of all kinds um I would say honestly if we think about crops that are going to do really well I mean I am always a fan of you know Peppers that produce abundantly we have this really cool variety called resilient shashido um I love a shashido pepper and these are hearty plants they produce a ton of fruit so you have that really amazing sort of like bang for your buck in terms of space utilization
